Frequently Asked Questions

Source: vignettes/faq.Rmd
faq.Rmd

Can other donor surveys be fused?

Yes. In principle, any U.S. household- or person-level national survey circa 2005 or later is a candidate for fusion.

Developed by Kevin Ummel.
